summary: I OPEN UP MY BACK HATCH TO GET MY BAGS OUT AND AS I WAS GETTING MY BAGS OUT OF THE BACK THE WINDOW EXPLODED ALL OVER ME.. CLASS GOT IN MY NECK AND ON MY BACK THANK GOD I HAD A HAT ON OR MY FACE WOULD OF GOT ALL CUT UP.. SOMETHING NEEDS TO BE DONE THIS HAS HAPPEN TO MANY PEOPLE. THERE IS NOT REASON FOR THIS, SOMEONE IS GOING TO GET HURT VERY BAD.. WHAT HAS TO HAPPEN SOMEONE LOSE  A EYE BEFORE SOMETHING IS DONE.. I AM NOT WAITING I AM GETTING A LAWYER. *TR
